originalText.text: I took up kickboxing to stay in shape, and thanks to Vinny, it's been fantastic! He pays close attention to every detail during our sessions, making them super effective. Vinny is not only motivating but super friendly, creating a really positive learning environment. His flexibility with schedules is a big plus. I've had nothing but positive experiences, and my skills have significantly improved—all thanks to Vinny. I highly recommend him as a great coach!

text.text: I took up kickboxing to stay in shape, and thanks to Vinny, it's been fantastic! He pays close attention to every detail during our sessions, making them super effective. Vinny is not only motivating but super friendly, creating a really positive learning environment. His flexibility with schedules is a big plus. I've had nothing but positive experiences, and my skills have significantly improved—all thanks to Vinny. I highly recommend him as a great coach!

originalText.text: I have been training with Vinny for a few years now and have made tremendous stride under his coaching. I knew nothing about martial arts before my training but would consider myself a lover of Muay Thai in particular. Though inexperienced, learning the proper form is important to me. As an educator, I strive to bring clear instructions, encouragement, good energy, and fun to folks I work with. Vinny brings it all. Not only does he come with great energy, he makes the sessions fun while keeping you to task. Vinny is excellent with both beginners and advanced fighters. Highly recommend.

originalText.text: Coach Vinny is a great martial arts coach and a knowledgeable nutritionist. His classes help you to get a great workout while also sharpening your technique. We recently worked together to come up with a nutrition plan leading up to a kickboxing tournament I fought in. Thanks to his help, I was able to make the weight limit easily without starving or draining myself, refuel after weigh-ins with the proper hydration and foods, and correctly hydrate between fights. I was able to fight and win 4 times in 2 days without any physical issues in large part thanks to Coach Vinny's help.

text.text: Coach Vinny is a great martial arts coach and a knowledgeable nutritionist. His classes help you to get a great workout while also sharpening your technique. originalText.text: I have been training with Vinny for over a year.  Vinny has such a broad knowledge base of fitness/nutrition/martial arts because he's so truly passionate about it (which is what you want in a trainer/coach).  I work with Vinny on Muay Thai fundamentals, and I saw major improvement on multiple fronts within 2-3 weeks of working with him.  Every session I come out having made some incremental progress.  Highly recommend reaching out to him to at least discuss your goals, and then go from there.

originalText.text: Vinny is an amazing trainer. I met him a few months ago after moving to New York and was instantly hooked on his group fitness classes at CKO. I dropped in on some of his classes at Zombie and was again, really impressed with his attention to detail and willingness to correct my technique, even in large classes. I’ve spent the past month doing personal training with him and have seen noticeable in sparring, my stamina, and weight loss. Can’t recommend Vinny enough!
